Text: Any comment about the quality? With Breaking Bad immerse is ussually quite shitty.
Well shitty is a bit harsh but it's a bit blocky if you know what I mean.
I wish these groups would just go back to encoding these the old way however we are lucky its not a 500mb release ?

Exactly, you know that if you're going to download something in 720p it's going to be a big file. If you have a slow connection but want it fast you have to download the lower resolution ones.

I have to say I haven't seen this yet so I'm going to take a look when it's done and comment on the quallity.
these new encoding rules that were brought in i think were more about saving bandwidth are we seeing the first signs of a poor world economy effecting the digital market
Real deal, top quality release, thanks a lot EZTV!
Thank you! Finally a new season :D
does anybody know what the deal is with the random jumps in brightness shortly after shot changes? Is it a defect with the rippers TV?
I'm not really digging the quality here guys, it's a bit jumpy, quite annoying.

C'mon. New encoding rules allow for BETTER QUALITY. Previously it had to be compressed on a given filesize no matter what. If immerse decides to give your crappier quality instead that's their decision, nobody stops them from releasing 2GB/1h show now.
Why is this such bad quality for HD? Can someone U/L a decent 720p file.... please....

@orly01

It's IMMERSE, they fuck everything up, quite well at that.
